meanings.definition: Not having a physical or mental disability.
meanings.sent1: The playground was accessible to all, including the unhandicapped children.
meanings.sent2: She was unhandicapped and could participate in all the activities with ease.
meanings.sent3: The unhandicapped squirrel easily climbed the tree to get away from the mischievous cat.
meanings.sent4: Her unhandicapped mind soared with creativity, unrestricted by any limitations.
meanings.sent5: The unhandicapped bird flew freely in the open sky, uninhibited by any obstacles.

meanings.definition: Not hindered or limited in ability or performance.
meanings.sent1: The unhandicapped athlete sprinted across the finish line, winning the race.
meanings.sent2: With his unhandicapped skills, he excelled in every task he undertook.
meanings.sent3: The unhandicapped car zoomed past the traffic, reaching its destination in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her unhandicapped determination pushed her to achieve her goals against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The unhandicapped river flowed smoothly, unrestricted by any dams or barriers.
